org.s2let
Class PixelizedMap

java.lang.Object
  org.s2let.PixelizedMap

public abstract class PixelizedMap
extends Object

Abstract class collecting the common properties of the Healpix and MW samplings and providing public interfaces / constructors, so that the user can avoid to manipulate different classes explicitly.

Field Summary
protected  boolean reality
          Reality flag: if the map is real, then it contains doubles instead of complex doubles.
protected  int resolution
          Resolution of the map: nside for Healpix, L for MW (which is also the bandlimit).
protected  SamplingScheme scheme
          Code name for the sampling scheme.
 
Constructor Summary
protected PixelizedMap(SamplingScheme sc, int reso, boolean rea)
          Private constructor to initialize the simple fields.
 
Method Summary
abstract  void computeHarmonics(org.bridj.Pointer<org.bridj.ComplexDouble> flm)
          Abstract method to compute the spherical harmonic decomposition of the map.
static PixelizedMap fromHarmonics(SphericalHarmonicTransform flm, SamplingScheme sc)
          Simplified factory method to create a Pixelized map from a spherical harmonic decomposition and a sampling scheme flag.
static PixelizedMap fromHarmonics(SphericalHarmonicTransform flm, SamplingScheme sc, int nside)
          Factory method to create a Pixelized map from a spherical harmonic decomposition, a sampling scheme flag and the resolution.
static PixelizedMap fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform wavelets, SamplingScheme sc)
          Simplified factory method to create a Pixelized map from a wavelet decomposition and a sampling scheme flag.
static PixelizedMap fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform wavelets, SamplingScheme sc, int nside)
          Factory method to create a Pixelized map from a wavelet decomposition, a sampling scheme flag and the resolution.
 boolean getReality()

Reality flag: if the map is real, then it contains doubles instead of complex doubles.

                       int reso,

reso - the resolution of the map
rea - the reality flag
Method Detail

getScheme

public SamplingScheme getScheme()
Getter for the scheme code name.

Returns:
the scheme flag

getReality

public boolean getReality()
Getter for the reality flag.

Returns:
true if the signal is real, false if it is complex

getResolution

public int getResolution()
Getter for the resolution field.

Returns:
the resolution

fromHarmonics

public static PixelizedMap fromHarmonics(SphericalHarmonicTransform flm,
                                         SamplingScheme sc,
                                         int nside)
Factory method to create a Pixelized map from a spherical harmonic decomposition, a sampling scheme flag and the resolution.

Parameters:
flm - the spherical harmonic decomposition
sc - the flag of the sampling scheme
nside - the Healpix resolution, only required if the map is Healpix
Returns:
a new instance for either a MW or a Healpix map

fromHarmonics

public static PixelizedMap fromHarmonics(SphericalHarmonicTransform flm,
                                         SamplingScheme sc)
Simplified factory method to create a Pixelized map from a spherical harmonic decomposition and a sampling scheme flag. The default resolution if the bandlimit of the input spherical harmonic transform.

Parameters:
flm - the spherical harmonic decomposition
sc - the flag of the sampling scheme
Returns:
a new instance for either a MW or a Healpix map

fromWavelets

public static PixelizedMap fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform wavelets,
                                        SamplingScheme sc,
                                        int nside)
Factory method to create a Pixelized map from a wavelet decomposition, a sampling scheme flag and the resolution.

Parameters:
wavelets - the axisymmetric wavelet decomposition
sc - the flag of the sampling scheme
nside - the Healpix resolution, only required if the map is Healpix
Returns:
a new instance for either a MW or a Healpix map

fromWavelets

public static PixelizedMap fromWavelets(AxisymmetricWaveletTransform wavelets,
                                        SamplingScheme sc)
Simplified factory method to create a Pixelized map from a wavelet decomposition and a sampling scheme flag. The default resolution if the bandlimit of the input wavelet transform.

Parameters:
wavelets - the axisymmetric wavelet decomposition
sc - the flag of the sampling scheme
Returns:
a new instance for either a MW or a Healpix map

computeHarmonics

public abstract void computeHarmonics(org.bridj.Pointer<org.bridj.ComplexDouble> flm)
Abstract method to compute the spherical harmonic decomposition of the map. The implementation depends on the map type.

Parameters:
flm - the spherical harmonic decomposition
